prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Henry Preble letter to Mrs. James, 1880, Accession #10922, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Sends thanks for a newspaper clipping relating to the flag of the Bon Homme Richardand her defeat of the Serapis. Preble wrote about the history of the flag in his forthcoming book. Mentions having promised an article to "The United Service." Mentions that he will dine with the Mass[achusetts] Cincinnati (a society of descendants of Revolutionary War officers).
